content: For the wildgrass I can't eat... oh, I mean the wildgrass I collected, I'll put it in the grass box by my door. Maybe you could use it for something later?
info: 绵朵除草-开启除草_绵朵莉除草开关

content: Okie-dokie, I'll continue my work then, <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>... Whenever I'm out walking, I'll help trim the floofy grass.
